name: Weather Provider
description: Forecast and historical weather data with site-specific localization for course conditions.

prd.problemStatement: Application timing, work planning, and turf management all depend on accurate weather data. Site-specific forecasts and historical data enable informed decisions.
goals: Support multiple data points (temp, precip, wind, humidity)
userStories: As a superintendent, I want accurate forecasts so that I can time applications correctly
As a superintendent, I want historical data so that I can analyze trends
